html:
Thy princes, &c. Figure of speechHermeneia . Interpreting the Figures of speechHypocatastasis in Isaiah 1:22.

princes are rebellious. Sarim sorerim , not a"pun" , but the Figure of speechParonomasia (App-6), for solemn emphasis. It may be Englished "thy rulers are unruly".

gifts = rewards, or bribes.
